TEXT.S:
Venezuela
u Venezuela sa i labu nu Cong-nan-mey-cuo, itiza i 8 00 N, 66 00 W u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 912,050 km2. u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 882,050 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 30,000 km2hamin nu tademaw sa 30,912,302. kakalukan umah sa 24.50%, kilakilangan umah sa 52.10%, zumaay henay umah sa 23.40%.
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Caracas.
kakinginan nu kanatal demiadkakinging nu kanatal demiad sa 5 bulad 7 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (cong-tung) ayza sa ci Nicolás Maduro, micakat a demiad sa i 2013 a mihca 4 bulad 19 demiad.
likisi1498 namahida, Vinai-zuela (Venezuelanaw Indians (In'-ti-an a tademaw ) Arawak (A-la-waw-ke a binacadan ) atu Caribbean (Cia-le-pi a binacadan ) a kakitidaan. cacay a malebut sepat a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku walu (1498) a mihcaan, Columbus (Ke-lun-pu ) makaadih tu Venezuela (Winai-zuela ) 15221717 cacay a malebut lima a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku tusa (1522) a mihcaan, Sipan-ya ) itini i Nanmea-cuoa sayaway kabulawan han i Sinka-ticenu aydaay a Vinai-zuelapatideng. cacay a malebut pitu a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku pitu (1717) a mihcaan Sinke-zuy-natafu-wankitidaan patideng sa, Vinai-zuelapakenisen malasin. 1810419181175 cacay a malebut walu a lasubu cacay a bataan (1810) a mihcaan sepat a bulad sabaw tu siwa a demiad nikasasumadan, Vinai-zuelamiliyas tu Si-pan-yaanipikuwan, sisa itida i cacay a malebu walu a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku cacay (1811) a mihcaan pitu a bulas lima a demiad mihapu misiteked kami sa, nika lepacawan caay pihedek. ·1821 namaka pinatu a mihcaan nikalepacawan, Vinai-zuela (Venezuelaitini i Namea--cuosinganganay misitekeday a tademaw ci Simon Bolivar (Si-Mun. puo-liwaw ·) pililidan, i cacay a malebut walu a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku cacay (1821) a mihcaan tatengan maala nu Si-pan-yaku kapisitekedan 18301830 katukuh tu caca a malebut walu a lasubu tulu a bataan (1830) a mihcaan, Vinai-zuela (Venezuelaatu Kelun-piya, Panama (Pa-na-ma ) atu Ecuador (E-kua-duo ) nu tepalay a kanatal malecad, u Colombia (Take-lunpi-ya ) kunhekuo. sa Vinai-zuela (Venezuelaitini i cacay a malebut walu a lasubu tulu a bataan (1830) a mihcaan misiteked a patideng, Colombia (Ta-ke-lun-pi-ya ) mihaputu amabulasak sa 1830·· cacay a malebut walu a lasubu tulu a bataan (1830) a mihcaan, mapatay satu ci Bolivar (Puo-li-waw ) , mimedmeday tu hitay a kakawaw ci Hesay. antun-niaw. pay-se (··) mihapusa tu Vinai-zuela (Venezuelaamiliyas tu Takelun-piya (Colombiamisiteked. 1831·· cacay a malebut walu a lasubu tulu a bataan idaw ku cacay (1831) a mihcaan ci Pay-semala Cungtun nu Vinai-zuela (Venezuela, pacici tu tademaw a cence, namaka labu kunipatalaw inai' sa ku lawat mikawan tu Vinai-zuelaatu nudumaan a kanatal tu sakaudip, nikudan satu belinen nu hitay. ci Paydeluo.kaue.aysekandun (··) pilalinzien mala Cungtun, tawyatu patideng tu Vinai-zuela kunhe-kuoVinai-zuela kunhe-kuoamica kuni patideng, tatenga inaitu ku tadatangah , mikuwanay tu kanatal uydatu umikuwanany, nikalawlawan a sakaudip mala mipataya tutademaw. ·· tusa satu a mihcaan ci Culi-an. kase-cu. kante'-lela-se (··) mibabelihan patasasa'en cinida, misakaput ci Kante'-lela-setu hitay a cen-fu, epingen ku kawaw, mapalekal ku Pawsuotanmibabelih, malingatu aca misapatas tu kawaw. 1859 sadikuday i cacay a malebut walu a lasubu lima a bataan idaw ku siwa (1859) a mihcaan mapatideng tu lima a mihcaan kini kalepacawan. nina kalepacawan sadikuday ci Falcon (Fael-kun ) nililidan nida a hitay kumakaciay, kunhe-kuomabelin, ci Falcon (Fael-kun ) mihapu patideng tu Vinai-zuela hecun-kuo, misabaluhay tu sinfa, sa lanpangen ku kawaw . 1920 Vinai-zuelai sabaw tu siwa (19) a se-ci atu tusa a bataan (20) a se-ci tu nupankiwan, hatidaay tu nutenes caay ka kapah, masasuada' ku cence atu micidekay a cence. 1952 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu lima a bataan idaw ku tusa (1952) a mihcaan tawya nu hitay a sakakaay ci Jimenez (Simen-neyse ) a hitay patidengsa tu linziay a Cung-tun, belineng ku Vinai-zuela hecun-kuo, patideng tu aydaay a cen-cun. 1958 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu lima a bataan idaw ku walu (1958) a mihcaan, mincu cuntun sadikuday pacicien nuheni ku hitay palusaliimeng nuheni amikaki tu kawaw nu kanatal. namakayda a mihcaan satu, sikiwentu ku sapalekal tu micu sifu mikawaw tu nuhitay a kawaw. 1998· cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku walu (1998) a mihcaan ci Uke.cawi-se (·) misadadas maala mala Vinai-zuela (VenezuelaCungtun. saka tusa a mihcaan nikala cungtungan malaheci nida ku sapisumad tu sinfa, naw lima a mihcaan kuni kala Cungtun paka tanayuen nida katukuh tu enemay a mihcaan, taneng miliyaw matulin kina cacayaca mala Cungtun. 2000· nikudan satau patideng tu baluhay a kuomin iyhua, kuohua naw tusaay a kawaw sumaden mala cacay, sapilebu tu mibelihay nu malumanay a kuohua. tusa a malebut (2000) a mihcaa ci Uke.cawi-se (·) nanisumadan satu ku nisingkiwan tu Cungtun u enemay a paya ku sakakina tusa nida maala Vinai-zuela (VenezuelaCungtun. 20063778123·63% tusa a malebut idaw ku enem (2006) a mihcaan tulu a bulad pitu a demiad, Vinai-zuela (Venezuelakuomin-ihuamikedatu hata atu hata a kulit nipisumadan, pabalucu tu pituay a bunac cunusen mala walu a bunac, kulitay nu hata a subayu nuw kawanan sumaden pasiyda i kawili kunipibahel. sabaw tusa a bulad tulu a demiad, Vinai-zuela (Venezuelamisinkiwan tu Cung-tun, ci UKe. Cawi-se (·) u enemay a bataan idaw ku tulu (63%) a kilac nu paya malaheci matulin mala Cung-tun, u saka tulu nida amaala Vinai-zuela (Venezuelaa Cung-tun.
